message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.Distributed, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the development of information systems operating in cloud infrastructures, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). It also addresses issues related to quality of service (QoS) and dynamic control of cloud resources, which are relevant to the Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) and Software Engineering (cs.SE) sub-categories. The paper proposes a modular structure that can be expanded by available computing power, which is related to the Distributed Systems (cs.Distributed) sub-category. Finally, the paper describes the establishment of a pilot cloud for experimentation, which is relevant to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category.
